statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id > 100;
SELECT id, name, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT address FROM customers WHERE phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe' OR address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT id, email FROM customers WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT station_name, location FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT station_name, location, capacity FROM charging_stations WHERE capacity BETWEEN 20 AND 80;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers JOIN charging_stations ON customers.customer_id = charging_stations.station_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT station_name, location, total_chargers FROM charging_stations WHERE operational = TRUE;
SELECT record_id, start_time, end_time, energy_consumed FROM charging_records ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND address IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.customer_name, cs.station_name, cr.start_time FROM customers c JOIN charging_records cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN charging_stations cs ON cr.station_id = cs.station_id WHERE cr.energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY cr.start_time ASC;

SELECT cs.station_name, COUNT(cr.record_id) AS total_records FROM charging_stations cs LEFT JOIN charging_records cr ON cs.station_id = cr.station_id GROUP BY cs.station_name HAVING total_records >= 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, cr.start_time, cr.end_time, cr.energy_consumed, cs.location FROM customers c JOIN charging_records cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN charging_stations cs ON cr.station_id = cs.station_id WHERE cr.energy_consumed < 20 AND cs.operational = TRUE ORDER BY cr.end_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT station_id, location FROM charging_stations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM charging_sessions WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT station_id, location, capacity FROM charging_stations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time, energy_consumed FROM charging_sessions WHERE energy_consumed > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM charging_stations WHERE station_location = 'City Center';
SELECT vehicle_model, vehicle_owner_id FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_owner_id = 3;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM charging_stations ORDER BY station_location DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, customer_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN customers ON vehicles.vehicle_owner_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT log_date, payment_amount FROM charging_logs INNER JOIN payments ON charging_logs.log_id = payments.payment_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY log_date ASC;
